title: Wastewater to wood
creator_credit: Russ Street, Streets Ahead Productions and Film Victoria
brief_description: A short documentary that examines the recycling of waste water for use. This project is one that is being undertaken jointly by the Forest Commission Reclaimed Water Committee and local sewerage authorities.
